Talk_0015:
I didn't know that while I was stuck in this
hole, the Great Fairies went into hiding
and my troupe reformed.
It sounds like I should get out of this hole
and join back up with the Stable Trotters
as soon as I can, but...
Talk_0511_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0100>Why don't you come to<sp:5:0:0> <clr:0000>Snowfield Stable<clr:ffff>,
too, and hear us perform?
Talk_0521:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>Except...your pouch is already full.<sp:0:4:0>I have <clr:0000>three bits of courser bee honey<clr:ffff>
for you, if you wouldn't mind getting rid
of some things to make room for them.
Talk_0016:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I can't climb up the side of this hole. <sp:5:1:0>Not
without <clr:0000>my wagon<clr:ffff>, at least, and I'd rather
not leave it behind.
Talk_0006_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>I'm relieved that someone came to rescue
me, <sp:5:0:0>but I hope you have a plan to <clr:0000>free me
from this hole<clr:ffff>.
Talk_0111:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Yeah...you're right.<sp:0:4:0>I might as well wish for my wagon to <clr:0000>take
to the air<clr:ffff>. <sp:5:1:0>Or for some kind of <clr:0000>ramp out
of the hole<clr:ffff> to mysteriously appear.<sp:0:4:0>Either of those is as likely as the wagon
getting <clr:0000>lifted out<clr:ffff> by some invisible force.<sp:0:4:0>I shouldn't go hoping for a miracle...
Talk_0506_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0400>Oh, have you not heard of us?<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>Us Stable Trotters are a music troupe that
goes around stables to perform.<sp:0:4:0>If I had to guess...<sp:5:0:0>it's out of your way,
but they might be near <clr:0000>Woodland Stable<clr:ffff>
over in Eldin.
Talk_0006_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>It's nice to know I'm not the only one this
happens to. <sp:5:0:0>But it would be nicer if you
had a plan to <clr:0000>free us from this hole<clr:ffff>.
Talk_0506_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:SurpriseS_00>Oh! <sp:5:1:0>You've met the troupe leader?!<sp:5:1:0> So the
Stable Trotters are back together...
Talk_0002_02: <sp:3:0:2:0a00>It happens to the best of us.
Talk_0102_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Greeting_01>All right, then. <sp:5:1:0>Let's hope you know what
you're doing!
Talk_0202_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Got it! <sp:5:0:0>It's raining anyway. Let's start this
whole thing over.
Talk_0001:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseM_01>Ugh...<sp:5:0:0> Oh, hey!<sp:5:1:0> Did you come down here
to rescue me?
Talk_0102_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_01>All right, then. <sp:5:0:0>Let's hurry and get out of
this rain.
Talk_0003:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I was heading to Rito Village, which is
suffering through a fierce blizzard, to
cheer them up with music and supplies.
I got my wagon going at a pretty good clip
on this road, but then I suddenly drove
into this hole. It's never been here before!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a00>The horse I was riding ran off somewhere,<sp:5:0:0>
and my cargo has spoiled. <sp:5:0:0>The only thing
I have left is the <clr:0000>wagon<clr:ffff>.
Talk_0004:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01>As if that weren't enough, now I'm wet...<sp:5:0:0>
and cold...<sp:5:0:0> Why did it have to rain?
Talk_0039:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Ah! <sp:5:0:0>Hold it! <sp:5:0:0>I'm not so sure about this.<sp:0:4:0>That wagon is important to me. Please
don't mess with it before checking first.
Talk_0510: <sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_01>And now I'd better be on my way.
Talk_0005:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I haven't figured out how to get <clr:0000>both me
and my wagon <clr:ffff>out this hole, and I won't
leave it behind.
Which leaves me stuck here, plain
and simple.
Talk_0101_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I can't climb up the wall of this hole, and
even if I could, I wouldn't want to leave
without my wagon.
Talk_0101_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Ahhh...<sp:5:1:0>if only someone could <clr:0000>pull my
wagon out of the hole with me in it<clr:ffff>.<sp:5:1:0>
Is that too much to hope for?
Talk_0561:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Oh! I'm glad to see you freed up some
room in your pouch.<sp:0:4:0>Well then, these are yours!
Talk_0100:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Hello again. How's everything going with
you? <sp:5:1:0>Not much has changed for me, sad
to say. Still stuck in a big hole.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a01>I've been playing my horn to keep my
spirits up. <sp:5:0:0>But it hasn't lessened my
desire to get out of this hole any.
Talk_0104: <sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:CallFar_00>I'm in the wagon! Ready to go!
Talk_0105:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Hmmm. <sp:5:1:0>Is it impossible<sp:5:0:0> to <clr:0000>get me out of
the hole while I'm riding in the wagon<clr:ffff>
after all?
Talk_0039_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Ah! <sp:5:0:0>Hold it! <sp:5:0:0>Hands off the wagon, please!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0000>I really don't want it to fall in the hole
again. <sp:5:1:0>Leave well enough alone!
Talk_0508_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0100>After I return this wagon I borrowed, I'm
going to rejoin the troupe.<sp:0:4:0>There are so many people who would
benefit from hearing us play!
Talk_0508_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>For the time being, I should head to
<clr:0000>Snowfield Stable<clr:ffff> and play my horn for
the Great Fairy there.
Talk_0041:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Ah! <sp:5:0:0>Hold it! <sp:5:0:0>Don't take my dear, precious
wagon away from me!
Talk_0042:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Whew. <sp:5:0:0>You had me going. <sp:5:0:0>Seems mean to
take another fellow's precious wagon.<sp:0:4:0>My wagon's not the only one who needs
to be freed from the hole. <clr:0000>I want to get
out too<clr:ffff>.
Talk_0121:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseS_01>Huh? The wagon's escaped without me!<sp:0:4:0>If that was your doing, please <clr:0000>wait until
I've boarded it<clr:ffff>. <sp:5:1:0>We're a team, after all!
Talk_0503:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>I got so nervous, I fogged up my glasses
and missed what you did...<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00>But you did it! You actually did it!<sp:5:1:0> Thank
you so much!<sp:0:4:0>If you hadn't come along, I don't know
how much longer I would have been
stuck in that hole.
Talk_0122: <sp:3:0:2:0c00>Huh? <sp:5:1:0>I can't get on the wagon like this.
Talk_0281:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Ease>Hey! <sp:5:0:0>Be more careful!<sp:5:0:0> Ahem...and I will
pull myself together.
Talk_0044:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Ease>Whew... <sp:5:0:0>That was a close one. <sp:5:0:0>Good thing
we got the fire out somehow.<sp:0:4:0>Be careful handling flames around my
wagon. It's irreplaceable.
Talk_0504:
<sp:3:0:2:0300>Come to think of it, if I hadn't made such
a rash decision during the earliest days of
the Upheaval, and run off on my troupe...<sp:0:4:0>maybe things wouldn't have ended up
like this.
Talk_0507_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_01>This is great news! <sp:5:1:0>I've been itching to
put my skills on the horn to good use.
Talk_0201:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal>Are you having trouble with this?<sp:5:0:0> Would
it help if I got back out?
Talk_0505:
I mean, the supplies I collected to help
feed Rito Village have all spoiled by
now anyway.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>I should get back to the <clr:0000>Stable Trotters<clr:ffff>
and rejoin my bandmates. That will do
more good.
Talk_0507_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_01>This is great news! <sp:5:1:0>So they're at <clr:0000>Dueling
Peaks Stable<clr:ffff> right now?
Talk_0551:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Before I return to the Stable Trotters,
I want to thank you for saving me from
the hole.<sp:0:4:0>I have <clr:0000>three bits of courser bee honey<clr:ffff>
for you, if you wouldn't mind getting rid
of some things to make room for them.
Talk_0011:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>*sigh* <sp:5:1:0>I used to play horn with the <clr:0000>Stable
Trotters<clr:ffff>, it's true.
Talk_0124:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Hmm. <sp:5:1:0>I'm going to have a hard time
getting on the wagon.<sp:0:4:0>Could you let me know when you've put
the wagon somewhere easier for me to
board it?
Talk_0046:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Ease>*sigh* <sp:5:0:0>I'm glad we got the wagon fixed.<sp:0:4:0>This wagon is very dear to me. <sp:5:0:0>Plus it's
borrowed, so please be careful with it.
Talk_0507_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_01>This is great news! <sp:5:1:0>So they're at <clr:0000>Outskirt
Stable<clr:ffff> right now?
Talk_0012:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseM_00>What?! <sp:5:1:0>The Great Fairy went into hiding?<sp:5:1:0>
And so the troupe is looking for me?
Talk_0013:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>Well, from bad to worse...<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>Have you heard how Rito Village north of
here is struggling to get enough food?
It really breaks my heart.
The Rito were always good to us when our
music troupe was touring the kingdom.

<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_00>So when I heard about a fierce blizzard
tearing into Rito Village, I couldn't just sit
and do nothing.
I slipped away from the troupe and made
for their village with supplies and songs
to ease their burdens.
Talk_0014:
I got my wagon going at a quick trot on
this road, but then I suddenly drove into
this hole. It didn't use to be here!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a00>The horse I was riding ran off somewhere,<sp:5:0:0>
and my cargo has spoiled. <sp:5:0:0>The only thing
I have left is the <clr:0000>wagon<clr:ffff>.
Talk_0509:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Greeting_00>Oh!<sp:5:0:0> One more thing!<sp:5:1:0>


Take this, please! It's a cooking ingredient
I picked up in my travels.

This is the least I can do for you getting
me out of there.
Talk_0511_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I'm sure we'll bump into each other again.<sp:5:0:0>
I look forward to playing my horn for you!
